forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun shines warmly upon the city, illuminating the landscape with a gentle glow. As the hours progress, temperatures are forecasted to settle near a comfortable 60 degrees, accompanied by a pleasant west-southwest breeze whispering through the streets. The skies remain predominantly clear, although there is a hint of that familiar coastal fog lingering just at the edges of the horizon, hinting at the presence of a marine layer. This ethereal blanket offers a charming reminder of the city’s maritime nature without fully shrouding the vibrant life below.

As evening approaches, the clouds will gently gather, bringing in cooler air that brings the low to a cozy 53 degrees. Those venturing out tonight may wish to wear layers—a light sweater or jacket would suffice against the cool breeze, as the wind mingles playfully through the city’s historic streets. Consider an evening stroll along the waterfront, where the gentle sounds of the waves create a soothing backdrop, or perhaps an intimate dinner at a nearby café, where the ambiance perfectly mirrors this serene, yet dynamic time in San Francisco.
